translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

For the knowledge of Your Lordship today, by which His Excellency Sir December 12 last be executed as soon as received by the authorities to whom they were addressed.

God keep Your Lordship Secretariat of War Affairs in Caçapava, February 29, 1840. Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Official letter from His Excellency February 29, received on March 12, ordering the immediate execution of the provisions regarding passports.

Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic To the citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, General Commander of Police of the Department of Boqueirão. From the Minister of War. Caçapava.

Stamp on

Printed copy of a decree attached to document CV-138.
